#FY20NDAA will require @DeptofDefense to plan for & respond to the effects of #climatechange on our national defense. Like every other aspect of everyday American life, it is vital for our military to confront these risks with solutions & resiliency policies

.@DeptofDefense has made it clear #climatechange is an immediate risk to mission readiness. Military bases that I've inspected like @MacDill_AFB & Naval Station Norfolk need to continue becoming hardened & resilient in face of rising sea levels & more frequent natural disasters

Our troops are the best America has to offer. I’m proud to have helped lead the charge in the #FY20NDAA for funding for a 3.1% raise for our men & women in uniform, including at @MacDill_AFB! pic.twitter.com/Qrkmke3RHi

America’s men & women in uniform deserve to know that their families are being protected in their homes. I've worked w/a bipartisan group of members to include a new Tenants Bill of Rights for military families & greater accountability for private housing contractors. #FY20NDAA pic.twitter.com/mHiDAXW6xh

I'm proud that investments at @MacDill_AFB that I championed were authorized in the #FY20NDAA, including 3.1% boost in pay & $11.5B for military construction & family housing. Our service members & their families are the best & they deserve the best.
